description:
During a visit with the respected Dr. Hiura, Takizawa finally learns the rules, expectations, and penalties that come with the role of a Seleção. He also learns how impossibly difficult it’s going to be to survive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Real na Genjitsu Kyokou no Genjitsu
リアルな現実 虚構の現実
